text: Telephone numbers in Andorra are six digits, with fixed line numbers beginning with the digits 8 and 7 and mobile telephone numbers with the digits 3, 4 and 6. Until 17 December 1994, Andorra was part of the French numbering plan, with the prefix 0628. Since 1994, Andorra has its own country code +376. *Country Code: +376 *International Call Prefix: 00 *Trunk Prefix: none Category:Telephone numbers Category:Andorra
title: Telephone numbers in Andorra
